name: NOS4A2
summary_text: Charlie Manx, a seductive immortal who feeds off the souls of children, has his whole world threatened when a young woman in New England discovers she has a dangerous gift.

name: The Replacements
summary_text: During a pro football strike, the owners hire substitute players.

name: To Catch a Thief
summary_text: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

name: Tall Girl
summary_text: Jodi, the tallest girl in her high school, has always felt uncomfortable in her own skin. But after years of slouching, being made fun of, and avoiding attention at all costs, Jodi finally decides to find the confidence to stand tall.

name: Wrong Turn 3: Left for Dead
summary_text: When their transfer bus crashes in a West Virginia forest, a group of convicts and a corrections officer meet a rafter who is on the run from cannibalistic hillbillies who have murdered her friends.

name: Persuasion
summary_text: Anne was in love with Frederick, who was rejected by her snobby parents 8 years ago. They've now hit hard times and rent out their mansion to his brother-in-law. He returns a Royal Navy captain. Will he remember Anne?

name: The Salvation
summary_text: In 1870s America, the fury of a notorious gang leader is unleashed when a peaceful American settler avenges the death of his family. Then as his cowardly fellow townspeople betray him, he is forced to hunt down the outlaws alone.

name: Candice Renoir
summary_text: The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 ...                See full summary »

name: El juego de las llaves
summary_text: Eight friends, all in stable relationships, venture into a game of sexual discovery by exchanging couples while trying to free themselves from their daily routines and add a spice to their love lives.

name: Zardoz
summary_text: In the distant future, a savage trained only to kill finds a way into the community of bored immortals that alone preserves humanity's achievements.

name: Devilman: Crybaby
summary_text: With demons reawakened and humanity in turmoil, a sensitive demon-boy is led into a brutal, degenerate war against evil by his mysterious friend, Ryo.

name: Seven Years in Tibet
summary_text: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

name: Mako Mermaids
summary_text: A young man is magically turned a merman, and discovers his underwater origins, after he comes in contact with the magic waters at the mysterious Mako Island guarded by a trio of mermaids.

name: Sister, Sister
summary_text: Tia Landry and Tamera Campbell are twins separated at birth who learn of each other's existence and come together as teenagers.

name: Away
summary_text: An American astronaut struggles with leaving her husband and daughter behind to embark on a dangerous mission with an international space crew.

name: Miller's Crossing
summary_text: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

name: House on Haunted Hill
summary_text: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

name: Beck
summary_text: Commissioner Martin Beck and his eccentric partner Gunvald Larsson investigate murders in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Out of Sight
summary_text: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

name: Alice
summary_text: The misadventures and trials of an aspiring singer and her co-workers at a greasy-spoon diner.

name: Exit to Eden
summary_text: Elliot heads for the sexual fantasy island, Eden. He takes some photos of diamond smugglers. They and undercover cops want the photos and follow him to Eden.

name: Mommy
summary_text: A widowed single mother, raising her violent son alone, finds new hope when a mysterious neighbor inserts herself into their household.

name: Are You Being Served?
summary_text: The misadventures of the staff of a retail floor of a major department store.

name: Child 44
summary_text: A disgraced member of the Russian military police investigates a series of child murders during the Stalin-era Soviet Union.

name: Mean Streets
summary_text: A small-time hood tries to keep the peace between his friend Johnny and Johnny's creditors.

name: The Artist
summary_text: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

name: Dungeons & Dragons
summary_text: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.

name: Before We Die
summary_text: A police inspector in the organised crime unit disappears after meeting with a mysterious informer.

name: Days of Heaven
summary_text: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

name: Justice Society: World War II
summary_text: The Justice Society of America, a group of heroes aiding the allies in World War 2, acquire an ally from the future who sends them on an adventure that changes history.

name: Ronin
summary_text: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

name: Arctic
summary_text: A man stranded in the Arctic after a plane crash must decide whether to remain in the relative safety of his makeshift camp or to embark on a deadly trek through the unknown.

name: Rebellion
summary_text: Rebellion is a five part serial drama about the birth of modern Ireland. The story is told from the perspectives of a group of fictional characters who live through the political events of the 1916 Easter Rising.

name: The Italian Job
summary_text: Comic caper movie about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam.

name: Thunderball
summary_text: James Bond heads to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.

name: Seven Seconds
summary_text: Tensions run high between African American citizens and Caucasian cops in Jersey City when a teenage African American boy is critically injured by a cop.

name: Moonfall
summary_text: In Moonfall, a mysterious force knocks the Moon from its orbit around Earth and sends it hurtling on a collision course with life as we know it. With mere weeks before impact, and against ...                See full summary »

name: Zathura: A Space Adventure
summary_text: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.

name: A Confession
summary_text: Detective Superintendent Steve Fulcher intends on catching a killer of a missing woman, even if that may cost him his career and reputation.

name: Date Night
summary_text: In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous.

name: The Body
summary_text: A detective searches for the body of a femme fatale which has gone missing from a morgue.

name: Glengarry Glen Ross
summary_text: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

name: The Girl with All the Gifts
summary_text: A scientist and a teacher living in a dystopian future embark on a journey of survival with a special young girl named Melanie.

name: Nine to Five
summary_text: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

name: Truth Seekers
summary_text: A team of part-time paranormal investigators use homemade gizmos to track the supernatural, sharing their adventures online. As their haunted stake outs become more terrifying they begin to uncover an unimaginable, apocalyptic conspiracy.

name: Gandhi
summary_text: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

name: Babe
summary_text: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

name: When a Stranger Calls
summary_text: A psychopathic killer terrorizes a babysitter, then returns seven years later to menace her again.

name: The Monster Squad
summary_text: A young group of monster fanatics attempt to save their hometown from Count Dracula and his monsters.

name: Monsters of Man
summary_text: A US weapons manufacturer tests its 4 killer robots on heroin producers in the Golden Triangle in SEAsia. It goes haywire.

name: Jolt
summary_text: A bouncer with a slightly murderous anger-management problem that she controls with the help of an electrode-lined vest she uses to shock herself back to normalcy whenever she gets ...                See full summary »

name: Michael
summary_text: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

name: Out of Africa
summary_text: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

name: Antrum: The Deadliest Film Ever Made
summary_text: A young boy and girl enter the forest to dig a hole to hell. Said to be a cursed film from the late 1970s, Antrum examines the horrifying power of storytelling.

name: A Goofy Movie
summary_text: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

name: Best of the Best
summary_text: A team from the United States is going to compete against Korea in a Tae Kwon Do tournament. The team consists of fighters from all over the country - can they overcome their rivalry and work together to win?

name: Mother's Day
summary_text: Three generations come together in the week leading up to Mother's Day.

name: Robin Hood
summary_text: The story of the legendary British outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.

name: Black Box
summary_text: After losing his wife and his memory in a car accident, a single father undergoes an agonizing experimental treatment that causes him to question who he really is.

name: Searching for Bobby Fischer
summary_text: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

name: Casino Royale
summary_text: In an early spy spoof, aging Sir James Bond comes out of retirement to take on SMERSH.

name: Rita Moreno: Just a Girl Who Decided to Go for It
summary_text: A look at the life and work of Rita Moreno from her humble beginnings in Puerto Rico to her success on Broadway and in Hollywood.

name: Kuroko's Basketball
summary_text: The Teiko Middle School Basketball Team. The school that produced three perfect seasons in a row, with five once-in-a generation players, called "The Generation of Miracles." There was ...                See full summary »

name: Devils
summary_text: A worldwide financial conspiracy is discovered by a group of traders of a large investment bank.

name: 3096 Tage
summary_text: A young Austrian girl is kidnapped and held in captivity for eight years. Based on the factual case of Natascha Kampusch.

name: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
summary_text: The Bakers, while on vacation, find themselves competing with a rival family of eight children.

name: Dumbo
summary_text: A young elephant, whose oversized ears enable him to fly, helps save a struggling circus, but when the circus plans a new venture, Dumbo and his friends discover dark secrets beneath its shiny veneer.

name: The Pillars of the Earth
summary_text: Set against a backdrop of war, religious strife and power struggles which tears lives and families apart.

name: Better Than Us
summary_text: A family on the brink of splitting up become the owners of a cutting-edge robot being sought by a corporation, homicide investigators and terrorists.

name: Great Expectations
summary_text: Modernization of Charles Dickens' classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York City pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.

name: Hung
summary_text: A former high school sports legend turned middle-aged high school basketball coach finds a way to benefit from his biggest asset.

name: Green Acres
summary_text: A New York City attorney and his wife attempt to live as genteel farmers in the bizarre community of Hooterville.

name: Mysterious Skin
summary_text: A teenage hustler and a young man obsessed with alien abductions cross paths, together discovering a horrible, liberating truth.

name: Constantine
summary_text: A man struggling with his faith who is haunted by the sins of his past is suddenly thrust into the role of defending humanity from the gathering forces of darkness.

name: Devil
summary_text: A group of people are trapped in an elevator and the Devil is mysteriously amongst them.

name: Escape Plan: The Extractors
summary_text: After security expert Ray Breslin is hired to rescue the kidnapped daughter of a Hong Kong tech mogul from a formidable Latvian prison, Breslin's girlfriend is also captured.

name: Siesta Key
summary_text: Follows a group of young adults confronting issues of love, heartbreak, betrayal, and looming adulthood as they spend the summer together. Nothing is off limits while they come of age, figuring out who they are and who they want to become.

name: Ema
summary_text: A couple deals with the aftermath of an adoption that goes awry as their household falls apart.

name: Real Genius
summary_text: Teenage geniuses deal with their abilities while developing a high-powered laser for a university project. When their professor intends to turn their work into a military weapon, they decide to ruin his plans.

name: Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising
summary_text: When their new next-door neighbors turn out to be a sorority even more debaucherous than the fraternity previously living there, Mac and Kelly team with their former enemy, Teddy, to bring the girls down.

name: Clueless
summary_text: A follow-up to the blockbuster movie of the same name, following the rich teenager Cher and her friends as they attend high school in Beverly Hills.

name: Blow Out
summary_text: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

name: Hocus Pocus 2
summary_text: Three young women accidentally bring back the Sanderson Sisters to modern day Salem and must figure out how to stop the child-hungry witches from wreaking havoc on the world.

name: Diagnosis Murder
summary_text: Dr. Mark Sloan has a knack for getting into trouble, negotiating the twists and turns of mysteries and solving crimes with the help of his son, Steve, a homicide detective.

name: Gone
summary_text: A woman is convinced her kidnapper has returned when her sister goes missing.

name: Welcome to the Dollhouse
summary_text: An awkward seventh-grader struggles to cope with inattentive parents, snobbish class-mates, a smart older brother, an attractive younger sister and her own insecurities in suburban New Jersey.

name: Paths of Glory
summary_text: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

name: The Edge
summary_text: An intellectual billionaire and two other men struggle to band together and survive after getting stranded in the Alaskan wilderness with a blood-thirsty Kodiak Bear hunting them down.

name: Elle
summary_text: A successful businesswoman gets caught up in a game of cat and mouse as she tracks down the unknown man who raped her.

name: Revolver
summary_text: Gambler Jake Green enters into a game with potentially deadly consequences.

name: The Drop
summary_text: Bob Saginowski finds himself at the center of a robbery gone awry and entwined in an investigation that digs deep into the neighborhood's past where friends, families, and foes all work together to make a living - no matter the cost.

name: Liv and Maddie: Cali Style
summary_text: Follows Liv, a popular television star whose show has just finished its run, and Maddie, an outstanding student and school basketball star whose popularity is on the rise, until Liv makes a return to their high school.

name: The Midnight Gospel
summary_text: Clancy, a spacecaster with a malfunctioning multiverse simulator, leaves the comfort of his home to interview beings living in dying worlds.

name: Prom Night
summary_text: At a high school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

name: When We First Met
summary_text: Noah meets Avery at a Halloween party and falls in love but gets friend-zoned. 3 years later, she's engaged to someone else. Noah returns in a time machine to fix things.

name: Why Him?
summary_text: A holiday gathering threatens to go off the rails when Ned Fleming realizes that his daughter's Silicon Valley millionaire boyfriend is about to pop the question.

name: The Art of Racing in the Rain
summary_text: Through his bond with his owner, aspiring Formula One race car driver Denny, golden retriever Enzo learns that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate the journey of life.

name: Unlocked
summary_text: A CIA interrogator is lured into a ruse that puts London at risk of a biological attack.

name: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed & Fabulous
summary_text: After Cheryl Frasier (Heather Burns) and Stan Fields (William Shatner) are kidnapped, Gracie Hart (Sandra Bullock) goes undercover in Las Vegas, Nevada to find them.

name: Antoinette dans les Cévennes
summary_text: Antoinette, a school teacher, is looking forward to her long planned summer holidays with her secret lover Vladimir, the father of one of her pupils. When learning that Vladimir cannot come...                See full summary »

name: A Good Day to Die Hard
summary_text: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

name: Witness for the Prosecution
summary_text: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

name: This Way Up
summary_text: A young woman puts her life back together after suffering from a nervous breakdown.

name: The Wretched
summary_text: A defiant teenage boy, struggling with his parents' imminent divorce, faces off with a thousand year-old witch, who is living beneath the skin of and posing as the woman next door.

name: Three Kings
summary_text: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

name: Moonraker
summary_text: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

name: Beastars
summary_text: In a world of anthropomorphic animals, a reclusive wolf's complicated relationship with a kindly rabbit is tested by a classmate's murder, a charismatic deer's influence, and his own burgeoning predatory instincts.

name: Suburgatory
summary_text: Tessa Altman is used to the big city but when her dad moves her away, she has to adapt to her new suburban life in Chatswin.

name: Brawl in Cell Block 99
summary_text: A former boxer-turned-drug runner lands in a prison battleground after a deal gets deadly.

name: Invictus
summary_text: Nelson Mandela, in his first term as President of South Africa, initiates a unique venture to unite the Apartheid-torn land: enlist the national rugby team on a mission to win the 1995 Rugby World Cup.

name: Jamestown
summary_text: A drama about English settlers in America in 1617.

name: Cloudburst
summary_text: A lesbian couple escape from their nursing home and head up to Canada to get married. Along the way, they pick up a young, male hitchhiker.

name: Cooties
summary_text: A mysterious virus hits an isolated elementary school, transforming the kids into a feral swarm of mass savages. An unlikely hero must lead a motley band of teachers in the fight of their lives.

name: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
summary_text: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

name: Armor Wars
summary_text: Find out in this series what would happen if Tony Stark's tech fell into the wrong hands.

name: The Wild Bunch
summary_text: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

name: Salem's Lot
summary_text: A novelist and a young horror fan attempt to save a small New England town which has been invaded by vampires.

name: Puberty Blues
summary_text: The mating rituals of two teenage surf chicks from the southern suburbs of Sydney.

name: The Man Who Sold His Skin
summary_text: His own body turned into a living work of art and promptly exhibited in a museum, Sam, a Syrian refugee, will soon realize to have sold away more than just his skin.

name: Raising Dion
summary_text: A widowed single mom discovers that her son has super powers and tries to figure out how to raise him safely and responsibly.

name: Punky Brewster
summary_text: A follow-up series to the 1980s sitcom about a young foster child named Punky. Now she's grown up with kids of her own.

name: The Proposition
summary_text: A lawman apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother, or else they'll execute his younger brother.

name: The Life of David Gale
summary_text: A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.

name: Assault on Precinct 13
summary_text: An unlikely partnership between a Highway Patrol Officer, two criminals and a station secretary is formed to defend a defunct Los Angeles precinct office against a siege by a bloodthirsty street gang.

name: The Woman in Black
summary_text: A young solicitor travels to a remote village where he discovers that the vengeful ghost of a scorned woman is terrorizing the locals.

name: Horse Girl
summary_text: Sarah, a socially isolated woman with a fondness for arts and crafts, horses, and supernatural crime shows finds her increasingly lucid dreams trickling into her waking life.

name: Shin Godzilla
summary_text: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster.

summary_text: Coming of age. In Buenos Aires, Eloy is on the verge of manhood. He studies physics, helps with the family headstone business, and does advertising - handing out flyers while walking on ...                See full summary »

name: Curse of the Undead
summary_text: While a malady is claiming the lives of young women in a Western town, a sinister gunslinger-for-hire Drake Robey is really a vampire, and it's up to Preacher Dan to save the town and girlfriend Dolores Carter.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
summary_text: England in the age of the Vikings is a fractured nation of petty lords and warring kingdoms. Beneath the chaos lies a rich and untamed land waiting for a new conqueror. Will it be you?

name: Dinosaur
summary_text: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sanctuary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

name: Ainbo
summary_text: In the spirit of Moana and Frozen, 'Ainbo - Spirit of the Amazon' is the epic journey of a young hero and her Spirit Guides, "Dillo" a cute and humorous armadillo and "Vaca" a goofy ...                See full summary »

name: Bullitt
summary_text: An all-guts, no-glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

name: The Pembrokeshire Murders
summary_text: Detective superintendent reopens two unsolved murder cases from the 1980s. Forensic methods link the crimes to a string of burglaries. Steve's team has to find more evidence before the perpetrator is released from prison.

name: Suburra: Blood on Rome
summary_text: In 2008, a fight over land in a seaside town near Rome spirals into a deadly battle between organized crime, corrupt politicians and the Vatican.

name: Twins
summary_text: A physically perfect but innocent man goes in search of his long-lost twin brother, who is short, a womanizer, and small-time crook.

name: The Sons of Katie Elder
summary_text: Ranch owner Katie Elder's four sons determine to avenge the murder of their father and the swindling of their mother.

name: The One I Love
summary_text: A troubled couple vacate to a beautiful getaway, but bizarre circumstances further complicate their situation.

name: Magic in the Moonlight
summary_text: A romantic comedy about an Englishman brought in to help unmask a possible swindle. Personal and professional complications ensue.

name: Galveston
summary_text: After escaping a set up, a dying hitman returns to his hometown of Galveston where he plans his revenge.

name: Hannibal Rising
summary_text: After the death of his parents during World War II, young Hannibal Lecter moves in with his beautiful aunt and begins plotting revenge on the barbarians responsible for his sister's death.

name: Iron Sky
summary_text: The Nazis set up a secret base on the dark side of the moon in 1945 where they hide out and plan to return to power in 2018.

name: Deep Water
summary_text: A well-to-do husband who allows his wife to have affairs in order to avoid a divorce becomes a prime suspect in the disappearance of her lovers.

name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
summary_text: A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.

name: Continuum
summary_text: A detective from the year 2077 finds herself trapped in present day Vancouver and searching for ruthless criminals from the future.

name: Shane
summary_text: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.

name: One Hour Photo
summary_text: A mentally unstable photo developer targets a middle-class family after his obsession with them becomes more sick and disturbing than any of them could imagine.

name: The Last Thing He Wanted
summary_text: A veteran D.C. journalist loses the thread of her own narrative when a guilt-propelled errand for her father thrusts her from byline to unwitting subject in the very story she's trying to break. Adapted from Joan Didion's namesake novel.

name: Carnivàle
summary_text: During the Great Depression, an Oklahoma farm boy and a charismatic minister learn that they are key players in a proxy war being fought between Heaven and Hell.

name: Chaplin
summary_text: An elderly Charlie Chaplin discusses his autobiography with his editor, recounting his amazing journey from his poverty-stricken childhood to world-wide success after the ingenious invention of the Little Tramp.

name: Sliver
summary_text: A woman moves into an exclusive New York City apartment building, which she soon discovers houses tenants with all manner of shocking secrets.

name: Audition
summary_text: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.

name: Terror Eyes
summary_text: Terrorized at multiple stops on a road trip to Joshua Tree, three friends realize something unexpected is pulling the strings.

name: Odd Thomas
summary_text: In a California desert town, a short-order cook with clairvoyant abilities encounters a mysterious man with a link to dark, threatening forces.

name: Land of the Lost
summary_text: A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall, his assistant Holly and a survivalist Will into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks.

name: Secrets of Sulphur Springs
summary_text: It is about a boy and his family moving into a supposedly haunted hotel on the edge of a small town.

name: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
summary_text: When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status.

name: Rocky Balboa
summary_text: Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

name: UnREAL
summary_text: A behind-the-scenes look at the chaos surrounding the production of a dating competition program.

name: Six Minutes to Midnight
summary_text: UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened.

name: Meatballs
summary_text: Wacky hijinks of counselors and campers at a less-than-average summer camp.

name: Black and Blue
summary_text: A rookie New Orleans police officer is forced to balance her identity as a black woman after she witnesses two corrupt cops committing murder.

name: The Poseidon Adventure
summary_text: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

name: My Mad Fat Diary
summary_text: Set in 1996 in Lincolnshire, the show tells the tragic and humorous story of a very troubled young girl, Rae, who spent four months in a psychiatric hospital for attempted suicide. After ...                See full summary »

name: Doom
summary_text: Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.

name: Roman Holiday
summary_text: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

name: Most Wanted
summary_text: In 1989, a Canadian journalist investigates the circumstances surrounding the suspicious arrest of a heroin addict imprisoned in a Thai jail.

name: Mr. Sunshine
summary_text: A young boy who ends up in the U.S. after the 1871 Shinmiyangyo incident returns to Korea at a historical turning point and falls for a noblewoman.

name: Deadwater Fell
summary_text: When a seemingly perfect and happy family is murdered by someone they knew and trusted, cracks appear on the surface of a supposedly idyllic community.

name: 20th Century Women
summary_text: The story of a teenage boy, his mother, and two other women who help raise him among the love and freedom of Southern California of 1979.

name: Diff'rent Strokes
summary_text: The misadventures of a wealthy Manhattan family who adopted the children of their late African American housekeeper from Harlem.

name: Naked and Afraid
summary_text: Reality show where two strangers (typically 1 male, 1female) try to survive in the wild for 21 days, naked.

name: Defiance
summary_text: Jewish brothers in Nazi-occupied Eastern Europe escape into the Belarussian forests, where they join Russian resistance fighters, and endeavor to build a village, in order to protect themselves and about one thousand Jewish non-combatants.

name: Catch-22
summary_text: A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.

name: The Syndicate
summary_text: Each series features a different group of people whose lives turn upside down after they jointly win the lottery.

name: The Perfect Score
summary_text: Six high school seniors decide to break into the Princeton Testing Center so they can steal the answers to their upcoming SAT tests and all get perfect scores.

name: Last Vegas
summary_text: Four friends take a break from their day-to-day lives to throw a bachelor party in Las Vegas for their last remaining single pal.

name: Funny Games
summary_text: Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

name: Dark Heart
summary_text: DI Will Wagstaffe and his team investigate horrifying and brutal attacks.

name: How It Ends
summary_text: In the midst of an apocalypse, a man struggles to reach his pregnant wife, who is thousands of miles away.

name: Tandav
summary_text: Tandav is a story that happens in the capital city of the world's largest democracy - DILLI (New Delhi), where it takes you inside the closed, chaotic doors of power and manipulation and uncover the darkest lanes of Indian politics.

name: Christopher Robin
summary_text: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.

name: Delhi Crime
summary_text: Based on the Nirbhaya case, Delhi Crime follows the Delhi Police investigation into the finding of the men who perpetrated this crime.

name: Outbreak
summary_text: Army doctors struggle to find a cure for a deadly virus spreading throughout a California town that was brought to America by an African monkey.

name: Joy
summary_text: Joy is the story of the title character, who rose to become founder and matriarch of a powerful family business dynasty.

name: The Terminal List
summary_text: A former Navy SEAL officer investigates why his entire platoon was ambushed during a high-stakes covert mission.

name: Dinosaur Hotel
summary_text: Sienna is desperate to win a large cash prize in a secret underground game show. However, dinosaurs begin to hunt her down for the entertainment of the rich and wealthy. Can she be the last to survive the horrific night to win the prize?

name: The New World
summary_text: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.

name: Enough
summary_text: After running away fails, a terrified woman empowers herself in order to battle her abusive husband.

name: Fiddler on the Roof
summary_text: In prerevolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant contends with marrying off three of his daughters while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

name: Killer Elite
summary_text: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for the death of his sons.

name: Vampires
summary_text: Recovering from an ambush that killed his entire team, a vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to walk in sunlight.

name: The Night of the Hunter
summary_text: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

name: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai
summary_text: The seemingly normal life of Sakuta Azusagawa, a high school student changes drastically when he meets a wild bunny girl that seems to be invisible to others.

name: Message from the King
summary_text: A mysterious outsider from South Africa, named Jacob King, arrives in Los Angeles to look for his missing younger sister.
A man's life is derailed when an ominous pattern of events repeats itself in exactly the same manner every day, ending at precisely 2:22 p.m.

name: Biloxi Blues
summary_text: A group of young recruits go through boot camp during the Second World War in Biloxi, Mississippi. From the play by Neil Simon.

name: Corner Gas
summary_text: The life, or lack thereof, of a proprietor of a gas station, which is the only stop for miles around and a hub of action on the Prairies.

name: The Farewell
summary_text: A Chinese family discovers their grandmother has only a short while left to live and decide to keep her in the dark, scheduling a wedding to gather before she dies.

name: I'm Your Woman
summary_text: In this 1970s set crime drama, a woman is forced to go on the run after her husband betrays his partners, sending her and her baby on a dangerous journey.

name: Heels
summary_text: Two brothers and rivals - one a villain, or "heel," in the ring; the other a hero, or "face," war over their late father's wrestling promotion, vying for national attention in small-town Georgia.

name: Poetic Justice
summary_text: Grieving hairdresser Justice goes on road trip from South Central Los Angeles to Oakland on mail truck alongside her friend and a postal worker which she cannot stand

name: The Festival
summary_text: After Nick's girlfriend dumps him, his best mate Shane has the perfect antidote to his break-up blues: three days at an epic music festival.
A Hollywood composer goes through a mid-life crisis and becomes infatuated with a sexy, newly married woman.

name: Tin Cup
summary_text: A washed up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the US Open in order to win the heart of his successful rival's girlfriend.

name: An American Crime
summary_text: The true story of suburban housewife Gertrude Baniszewski, who kept a teenage girl locked in the basement of her Indiana home during the 1960s.

name: 48 Hrs.
summary_text: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.

name: Freedom Writers
summary_text: A young teacher inspires her class of at-risk students to learn tolerance, apply themselves and pursue education beyond high school.

name: The Cotton Club
summary_text: Meet the jazz musicians, dancers, owner and guests (e.g. gangster Dutch Schultz) of The Cotton Club in 1928-30s Harlem.

name: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
summary_text: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who had left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

name: Under the Stadium Lights
summary_text: Brother's Keeper is a true story about the '09 Abilene High School Football team.

name: Life Like
summary_text: An idealistic, attractive young couple acquires a stunning, life-like robot for guilt-free help; but, as the three grow closer, their perception of humanity will be altered forever.

name: The Bucket List
summary_text: Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.

name: The Best Offer
summary_text: A lonely art expert working for a mysterious and reclusive heiress finds not only her art worth examining.

name: The Last Seduction
summary_text: A devious sexpot steals her husband's drug money and hides out in a small town where she meets the perfect dupe for her next scheme.

name: The Way Back
summary_text: Siberian gulag escapees travel four thousand miles by foot to freedom in India.

name: Under the Tuscan Sun
summary_text: A writer impulsively buys a villa in Tuscany in order to change her life.

name: One Life to Live
summary_text: One Life to Live centres takes place in the fictional town of Llanview, PA.around the wealthy Lord family, and the middle-class Woleks and Rileys.

name: Teeth
summary_text: Still a stranger to her own body, a high school student discovers she has a physical advantage when she becomes the object of male violence.

name: Friends from College
summary_text: Twenty years after graduation, a tight-knit group of college friends reconnects and discovers that love hasn't gotten easier with age.

name: Haunted
summary_text: A chilling glimpse into the first-person accounts from people who have witnessed horrifying, peculiar, extraordinary supernatural events and other unexplained phenomena that continue to haunt them.

name: Demolition
summary_text: A successful investment banker struggles after losing his wife in a tragic car crash. With the help of a customer service rep and her young son, he starts to rebuild, beginning with the demolition of the life he once knew.

name: Vantage Point
summary_text: The attempted assassination of the American President is told and re-told from several different perspectives.

name: Somewhere in Time
summary_text: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

name: The Break-Up
summary_text: In a bid to keep their luxurious condo from their significant other, a couple's break-up proceeds to get uglier and nastier by the moment.

name: Vice Principals
summary_text: An over protective father is obsessed with becoming a principal and competes against the popular vice principal. However something happens that makes them work together to save the day.

name: Saving Mr. Banks
summary_text: Author P.L. Travers reflects on her childhood after reluctantly meeting with Walt Disney, who seeks to adapt her Mary Poppins books for the big screen.

name: The Crew
summary_text: Life in the garage swerves off track for a NASCAR crew chief and his tight-knit racing team when a new boss steps in and shakes things up.

name: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
summary_text: Balthazar Blake, an apprentice of the legendary magician Merlin, must train his old teacher's successor - an introverted but resourceful physics prodigy - in the art of sorcery to prevent the return of Morgana le Fay.

name: Chernobyl: Abyss
summary_text: A story about a heroic fireman who worked as one of Chernobyl liquidators.

name: Virgin Territory
summary_text: Young Florentines take refuge from the black plague and engage in bawdy adventures and lusty exchanges.

name: Absolutely Fabulous
summary_text: The wild misadventures of Edina "Eddy" Monsoon and her best friend Patsy Stone, who live in a nearly constant haze of drugged, drunken selfishness.

name: Batman: The Movie
summary_text: The Dynamic Duo faces four supervillains who plan to hold the world for ransom with the help of a secret invention that instantly dehydrates people.

name: The Unicorn
summary_text: A widower is eager to move on from the most difficult year of his life, only to realize he's utterly unprepared to raise his two daughters on his own and equally unprepared for the dating world where he's suddenly a hot commodity.

name: Asuran
summary_text: The teenage son of a farmer from an underprivileged caste kills a rich, upper caste landlord. Will the farmer, a loving father and a pacifist by heart, be able to save his hot-blooded son is the rest of the story.

name: The Bridges of Madison County
summary_text: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

name: Turbo
summary_text: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

name: Banana Fish
summary_text: The story captures the war between a mafia boss named Dino and a young gang leader searching for redemption.

name: Maverick
summary_text: Bret and Bart Maverick are well-dressed gamblers who migrate from town to town always looking for a good game.

name: Peter Pan
summary_text: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

name: The Social Dilemma
summary_text: Explores the dangerous human impact of social networking, with tech experts sounding the alarm on their own creations.

name: The Vicar of Dibley
summary_text: A boisterous female minister comes to serve in an eccentricly conservative small town's church.

name: The Game
summary_text: A spinoff of Girlfriends (2000) featuring a group of women who all have relationships with professional football players.

name: No Activity
summary_text: Two low-level cops who have spent too much time in a car; two criminals who are kept in the dark; two dispatch workers who haven't really clicked; and two Mexican tunnelers who are in a small space considering they've only just met.

name: Sphere
summary_text: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

name: Girl with a Pearl Earring
summary_text: A young peasant maid working in the house of painter Johannes Vermeer becomes his talented assistant and the model for one of his most famous works.

name: The Bling Ring
summary_text: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.

name: Barefoot
summary_text: The "black sheep" son of a wealthy family meets a young psychiatric patient who's been raised in isolation her entire life. He then takes the naive young woman home for his brother's wedding.
